item.title: June 16-22 Week in Review
item.author: Gavin
item.description: This was an uneventful week. A lot of professional work intruded on slow productivity, but will get back to normal soon.

item.title: June 2-8 Week In Review
item.author: Gavin
item.description: Podcasts I enjoyed The Tim Ferriss two for one episodes have been great. This one stuck out: The Tim Ferriss Show. Zschau’s story is remarkable and Collins system for tracking creativity is pretty cool. The Rich Roll Podcast. Roll On is always fun. C++ Updates Mostly the same as last week, but did some practice with googletest for mocking. Finished a few of the Build Your Own Redis on codeCrafters in addition to some updates to gm-git.

item.title: May 26-June 1 Week in Review
item.author: Gavin
item.description: A delightful week of slow productivity. A few fun things to share. Podcasts I enjoyed The Tim Ferriss Show two for one with Brene Brown and Edward O. Thorp. The Rich Roll Podcast with Dan Churchill. Technically, I listened to this last week, but wanted to share. Resources I’ve been using for C++ and Things that have me curious Rucking as a means of improving my health. I am not a runner and while I like walking, I’d like to get more out of it.
